name: "Quina & Q"
description:
This game is a prototype of a 3D platformer, we wanted to hand-paint all the textures of the game to create its own personality and make it a part of the game that would stand out a lot. The protagonist of the game must overcome each level of platforms to discover the truth of the disappearance of her father. In this prototype we are 2 people, both for the idea, the art and the programming that is implemented in the game. The game control:  -W,A,S,D  to move -Space to jump (Double space to double jump) Developers:

- Lorenzo García Plaza : https://www.artstation.com/lorenzogpla

- Alma Florido Bautista : https://www.artstation.com/almasketch
